Key Match Events: Walk-off loss in the bottom of the ninth inning resulting in a 2-1 final score
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals decided to rest their top rotation arms for the postseason, starting Seth Lugo with a shortened innings count
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Matt Quatraro emphasized the need for the Royals to score runs against strong pitching
Bobby Witt Jr. sat out to ensure he's fully prepared for the postseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game's outcome affected the Royals' seeding and playoff opponents
Seth Lugo was the MLB innings leader entering the game
Others: The Royals' bullpen got crucial work in ahead of the postseason
